page.shortlink: ux control properties textarea properties disabled
page.description: Specify if the control is disabled. Alternatively, if you want the control to be disabled only if a certain condition is true, see the 'Client-Side Properties', 'Enable expression'. If this control is used in a List control's 'Detail View' you MUST use client-side properties to disable the control.
